data.lyric:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Christmas Songs - 40 Seasonal Favourites]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow! - Dean Martin (迪安·马丁)
[00:07.88]Oh the weather outside is frightful
[00:11.33]But the fire is so delightful
[00:14.03]
[00:14.87]And since we've no place to go
[00:17.57]
[00:18.36]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
[00:20.71]
[00:21.87]Man it doesn't show signs of stopping
[00:24.86]
[00:25.36]And I've brought me some corn for popping
[00:28.21]
[00:29.41]The lights are turned way down low
[00:31.68]
[00:32.33]Let it snow let it snow
[00:35.39]
[00:36.33]When we finally kiss goodnight
[00:38.60]
[00:39.57]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[00:42.19]
[00:43.05]But if you really hold me tight
[00:45.88]
[00:46.76]All the way home I'll be warm
[00:49.33]
[00:50.38]And the fire is slowly dying
[00:52.75]
[00:53.66]And my dear we're still goodbying
[00:56.52]
[00:57.08]But as long as you love me so
[00:59.81]
[01:00.65]Let it snow let it snow and snow
[01:03.56]
[01:18.53]When we finally kiss goodnight
[01:21.91]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[01:24.78]
[01:25.63]But if you really grab me tight
[01:28.53]
[01:29.08]All the way home I'll be warm
[01:31.85]
[01:32.49]Oh the fire is slowly dying
[01:34.87]
[01:35.94]And my dear we're still goodbying
[01:38.73]
[01:39.57]But as long as you love me so
[01:41.98]
[01:42.81]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
data.trans:
[ti:Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Christmas Songs - 40 Seasonal Favourites]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.88]噢 屋外的天气真是冷的让人受不了
[00:11.33]还好壁炉中的火燃烧的正旺
[00:14.03]
[00:14.87]打这天气开始我们就无处可去
[00:17.57]
[00:18.36]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
[00:20.71]
[00:21.87]它没有停下来的迹象
[00:24.86]
[00:25.36]我买了些爆米花
[00:28.21]
[00:29.41]连这灯光也逐渐昏黄暗淡
[00:31.68]
[00:32.33]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
[00:35.39]
[00:36.33]最终你我拥吻互道晚安
[00:38.60]
[00:39.57]我多么讨厌在暴风雨时外出
[00:42.19]
[00:43.05]但若你抱的我真的很紧
[00:45.88]
[00:46.76]那所有归家的路我都将觉得无比温暖
[00:49.33]
[00:50.38]火慢慢地熄灭
[00:52.75]
[00:53.66]亲爱的 我们仍在说再见
[00:56.52]
[00:57.08]那就像你爱我那般绵长久远
[00:59.81]
[01:00.65]就让雪继续下吧
[01:03.56]
[01:18.53]最终你我拥吻互道晚安
[01:21.91]我多么讨厌在暴风雨时外出
[01:24.78]
[01:25.63]但若你抱的我真的很紧
[01:28.53]
[01:29.08]那所有归家的路我都将觉得无比温暖
[01:31.85]
[01:32.49]哦 火慢慢地熄灭
[01:34.87]
[01:35.94]亲爱的 我们仍在说再见
[01:38.73]
[01:39.57]那就像你爱我那般绵长久远
[01:41.98]
[01:42.81]下吧 那就继续下吧 这满天纷飞的醉人的大雪
